message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this exceptional product with you. I believe it has tremendous value and I'm looking forward to hearing your thoughts.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $750000. I believe it's a bit above my budget, but I'm willing to make a serious offer.

I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $850000. I believe it's a fair price considering the product's value and the market demand. Let me know if you're willing to meet me in the middle.
I'm still interested in the product, but I think $850000 is a bit steep. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I can only go up to $775000. Can we discuss further?

I understand you're trying to meet me halfway, Bob, but I'm not quite there yet. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to make sure I'm getting a fair price. I'm willing to meet you at $825000, but I'm not going any lower than that. Let me know if that's acceptable to you.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice, but $825000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to make a serious offer, so I'll go up to $795000. I think that's a fair price for the product.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob, and I'm glad we're getting closer to a deal. I'm willing to meet you at $810000, but I'm not going to go any lower than that. I think it's a fair price considering the product's value and the market demand. Let's see if we can finalize the deal at this price.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me at $810000, Alice, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to make one more serious offer, so I'll go up to $795000. I think that's the best I can do, and I'm hoping we can finalize the deal at this price.

I understand you're trying to get the best deal, Bob, but I'm not willing to go back to $795000. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $810000 and $795000, which is $802500. I think that's a fair price considering the product's value and the market demand. Let's see if we can finalize the deal at this price.
Alice, I appreciate your persistence, but I'm afraid I've reached my limit. I'm willing to go up to $800000, and that's as high as I can go. I hope we can finalize the deal at this price.
